name: Beat Chicken Boss - Kick and Whack the Funny Street Chicken Jerk Buddy: Killer Stress Relief Carnival Game
name_original: Beat Chicken Boss - Kick and Whack the Funny Street Chicken Jerk Buddy: Killer Stress Relief Carnival Game
description:
Crazy Tap bubble to beat the stupid birds!
Tap bubble to make more Combo!

Feature
- Beat the stupid birds, enjoy the funny moment!
- Easy tap fun, how many combo can you get?!
- 7 awesome items, amazing gameplay.
- Collect letters and challenge the secret Boss daily.
- Weekly global ranking! Who is the BEST?
- Record your funny voice in game, free play, more fun!
